item.title: COVID-19 SR Visualisation in R
item.description: This is a data analysis report concerning the visualisation of the COVID-19 virus within the Republic of Serbia. All of the report is created with R. To learn how to use R and develop a report like this visit Data Literacy in R. This is a Sister Analyst project. Open data belongs to everyone; it empowers people to make informed decisions that are not clouded by misinformation, rumour and gossip.
